text: This Thursday, our country will listen to the findings of the January 6th Committee and the danger Trump and his supporters caused that day. This guide is a good read ahead of time. https://t.co/oOw9JUWWyo

It was a pleasure to connect with @ClaudiaOrtizSV. We both agree that the investments coming from the Biden Administration should be subject to thorough oversight. No corrupt officials should get their hands on these impactful investments. https://t.co/BBhTaJoCB7

This #NationalHigherEducationDay I'm thanking Dr. Coley at @calpolypomona. CPP serves nearly 30k students and conducts valuable research. Thank you Dr. Coley for your leadership and for providing exceptional academic and professional opportunities to the #InlandEmpire. https://t.co/Rv2xJLQyzd

Thank you to all who participated in the conversation. We must be clear-eyed about with whom we are working and the enormity of the challenge our nations face and recognize that we have the opportunity now to make a real change to improve conditions for the people we serve.

No 18-year-old in America needs a semiautomatic rifle. Weapons of war shouldn’t be easily accessible to young adults – or anyone in our country. https://t.co/t2P4Sk30kk

Our economic recovery continues to be strong: In May, 390,000 jobs were created, and unemployment stayed near historic lows. Americans continue to join our resilient and diverse labor force, even in the Inland Empire. Happy #JobsDay to those who celebrate!

Call (202) 224-3121 to be connected to your Senator’s office and urge them to pass Bipartisan Background Checks and Enhanced Background Checks. There’s no reason for commonsense gun reform to be stalled in the Senate right now.

Next week, we will take another significant step in the House to #EndGunViolence through common-sense gun legislation that will protect our communities.
 
This Gun Violence Awareness Day, I’m remembering every victim of gun violence and driving my anger into action.
Join my office for a job and resource fair next Friday in @CityofOntario and learn what other programs and services we offer to local veterans. https://t.co/iQvyC1WQEc

Nonconsensual condom removal is sexual violence that can have lifelong consequences – consent is key, it’s that simple.
